# SingleStoreBulkLoader.FileName property

The name of the local (if [`Local`](./Local.md) is `true`) or remote (otherwise) file to load. Either this or [`SourceStream`](./SourceStream.md) must be set.

```csharp
public string? FileName { get; set; }
```
